CustomField.formula: (No_of_working_hours_in_a_day__c * No_working_days_in_month__c * Charge_per_hour__c) + (No_Of_working_Days__c * Fuel_Avg_in_LtrHr__c * Cost_of_Fuel_per_litre__c * No_of_hr_opearted_in_a_day__c) + (Drivers_Salary__c + CleanerOperator_Salary__c + Taxes_Permit__c + Maintenance_Cost__c + Misc_Exps__c)
CustomField.label: Total Hire Cost
